column3: 3種の宝石を探し出し、討伐せよ
column4: Find and defeat the three types of gems.

column3:
"古の祭祀場にて闇の者たちの波動を感知している
騎士団はこれに対処すべく覚者らの協力を求める"
column4:
"The Knight's Order has detected waves of
darkness from the Ancient Ritual Ground, and
they seek the assistance of the Arisen to deal
with it"

column3:
古の祭祀場にて魔物出現への対処を開始している
騎士団討伐隊も死力を尽くしてこれに当たっているが
強力な魔物らを制するには覚者の協力が不可欠だ
また深部からは強力な個体のものと思われる波動が
検知されている
今は少しでも多くの応援が欲しい
column4:
At the Ancient Ritual Ground, measures to deal
with the appearance of monsters have begun. The
knight squad is also doing their best to face
this, but the cooperation of the Arisen is
essential to overcome powerful monsters.
Furthermore, powerful waves, presumed to be from
individual creatures in the depths, have been
detected. We need as much support as possible
right now.

column3:
古の祭祀場で魔物出現に対処中である
強力な敵個体も検知した、騎士団員は
総力を尽くしているが覚者の協力が必須だ
column4:
We're currently dealing with the appearance of
monsters at the Ancient Ritual Ground.
We've also detected powerful enemy individuals;
the knights are giving their all, but the
cooperation of the Arisen is essential.

column3: 敵討伐しながら《リムストーンの原石》を探せ
column4:
Search for the Riftstone Ore while subjugating
enemies.

column3:
祭祀場での事態は収束した、覚者の協力に
感謝する、戦況報告がまとまったら、戦果報酬を
配分しよう、しばらく待機してくれ
column4:
The situation at the ritual site has been brought
under control.
We are grateful for the assistance of the Arisen.
Once the battle report is compiled, we will
distribute the spoils of war. Please wait
patiently for a while.

column3:
報酬配分が確定した
覚者は受け取り手続きを済ませてくれ
今後も騎士と覚者は協力して事態解決に当たろう
column4:
The distribution of rewards has been finalized.
Arisen, please complete the necessary steps for
receiving them.
In the future, the Knight and Arisen shall
cooperate to resolve the situation.

column3:
古の祭祀場にて魔物出現への対処を開始している
騎士団討伐隊も死力を尽くしてこれに当たっているが
強力な魔物らを制するには覚者の協力が不可欠だ
なお深部で感知されている強力な個体の波動に
一部乱れのようなものが認められたらしい
もし攻勢をかける好機ならば、より応援が必要だ
column4:
Efforts have begun to deal with the appearance of
monsters at the ancient ritual site. The Order of
Knights' extermination team is also doing its
utmost in this regard, but the cooperation of the
Arisen is essential to control these powerful
monsters. Additionally, it seems that there has
been some disturbance detected in the waves from
the powerful individual sensed in the depths. If
there's an opportune moment to launch an
offensive, even more support will be required.

column3: 太古の強者《リザルト報酬》

古の祭祀場で魔物出現に対処中である
強力な敵個体も検知した、騎士団員は
総力を尽くしているが覚者の協力が必須だ
column4:
We're currently dealing with the appearance of
monsters at the Ancient Ritual Ground.
We've also detected powerful enemy individuals;
the knights are giving their all, but the
cooperation of the Arisen is essential.

column3: 錬魔具と溶命石を攻撃し、黄金竜を撃退せよ
column4:
Attack the alchemical tools and life crystals,
and repel the Golden Dragon!

column3: 迅速に撃退し、60000pt以上獲得を目指せ
column4:
Swiftly repel the enemy and aim to acquire more
than 60,000 points.

column3:
古の祭祀場にて魔物出現への対処を開始している
騎士団討伐隊も死力を尽くしてこれに当たっているが
強力な魔物らを制するには覚者の協力が不可欠だ
また深部からは強力な個体のものと思われる波動が
検知されている
今は少しでも多くの応援が欲しい
column4:
At the Ancient Ritual Ground, measures to deal
with the appearance of monsters have begun. The
knight squad is also doing their best to face
this, but the cooperation of the Arisen is
essential to overcome powerful monsters.
Furthermore, powerful waves, presumed to be from
individual creatures in the depths, have been
detected. We need as much support as possible
right now.

column3: 太古の強者《リザルト報酬》

古の祭祀場で魔物出現に対処中である
強力な敵個体も検知した、騎士団員は
総力を尽くしているが覚者の協力が必須だ
column4:
We're currently dealing with the appearance of
monsters at the Ancient Ritual Ground.
We've also detected powerful enemy individuals;
the knights are giving their all, but the
cooperation of the Arisen is essential.

column3: 弱点部位を攻撃し、グランエントを討伐せよ
column4: Attack the weak points and defeat the Grand Ents.

column3: 迅速に討伐し、40000pt以上獲得を目指せ
column4:
Swiftly defeat the enemy and aim to acquire more
than 40,000 points.

column3:
黄金竜はこれまでの敵とは比べ物にならない
強さだ、勇気ある覚者も充分な準備を整えて
決戦に臨んでくれ
column4:
The Golden Dragon is incomparable to previous
enemies in terms of strength, so please,
courageous Arisen, make thorough preparations and
face the decisive battle.

column3:
決戦の地では激しい戦いが展開されている
黄金竜の勢いは衰えを知らず、数で有利な我々も
一瞬たりとも気を抜けない状況だ
白竜との因縁深きやつの接近をこれ以上許せば
レスタニアの地が危ない
勇士よ集え、さらなる覚者の応援を請う
column4:
A fierce battle is unfolding at the battlefield.
The momentum of the Golden Dragon shows no signs
of waning, and despite our numerical advantage, we
can't afford to let our guard down for even a
moment. If we allow that one, deeply fated with
the White Dragon to approach any further, the land
of Lestania will be in danger. Warriors, come
together, and we request further support from the
Arisen.

column3:
黄金竜との決戦が展開中だ、こちらは数で
優位にあるが、奴の勢いは衰えを知らない
さらなる覚者の応援を請う
column4:
The battle with the Golden Dragon is currently
underway. We have the numerical advantage, but its
momentum shows no sign of weakening. We request
further support from the Arisen.

column3:
黄金竜の撃退に成功した
覚者の連携力と勇気がこの成果に繋がったのだ
戦果は追って報告する、白竜に感謝し待つがいい
column4:
The Golden Dragon has been successfully repelled.
The cooperation and bravery of the Arisen led to
this achievement.
The results of the battle will be reported later,
we thank the White Dragon and await its return.

column3:
健闘を讃え報酬を配分する
この経験を活かしさらなる精進に励んでくれ
黄金竜は必ずまた来る、次回も協力よろしく頼む
column4:
We applaud your valiant efforts and will
distribute the rewards. Please make use of this
experience and strive for further improvement. The
Golden Dragon will definitely come again, so
please cooperate with us next time.

column3:
決戦の地では激しい戦いが展開されている
黄金竜の勢いは衰えを知らず、数で有利な我々も
一瞬たりとも気を抜けない状況だ
白竜との因縁深きやつの接近をこれ以上許せば
レスタニアの地が危ない
勇士よ集え、さらなる覚者の応援を請う
column4:
A fierce battle is unfolding at the battlefield.
The momentum of the Golden Dragon shows no signs
of waning, and despite our numerical advantage, we
can't afford to let our guard down for even a
moment. If we allow that one, deeply fated with
the White Dragon to approach any further, the land
of Lestania will be in danger. Warriors, come
together, and we request further support from the
Arisen.

column3: 眩き黄金《リザルト報酬》

黄金竜との決戦が展開中だ、こちらは数で
優位にあるが、奴の勢いは衰えを知らない
さらなる覚者の応援を請う
column4:
The battle with the Golden Dragon is currently
underway. We have the numerical advantage, but its
momentum shows no sign of weakening. We request
further support from the Arisen.

column3: 錬魔具と溶命石を攻撃し、黄金竜を撃退せよ
column4:
Attack the alchemical tools and life crystals,
and repel the Golden Dragon!

column3: 迅速に撃退し、100000pt以上獲得を目指せ
column4:
Swiftly repel the enemy and aim to acquire more
than 100,000 points.

column3:
謎の敵の出現の兆しがある、今より迎撃態勢を
告知する、協力を申し出た覚者は最優先で
対処に応じてくれ、騎士団も協力を惜しまない
column4:
There are signs of the mysterious enemy's
appearance, so we are announcing the need to
prepare for interception. The Arisen who offered
their cooperation will be given top priority and
responded to accordingly. The Knight Order also
willingly offers their assistance.

column3:
レスタニアで謎の敵影が目撃され
襲撃報告も入ってきている
各自、最悪の状況を想定して行動せよ
白竜は言う「覚者とは抜き身の刃、研がねば腐る」
いまこそその力、研ぎ澄ますのだ
column4:
A mysterious enemy presence has been spotted in
Lestania, and there have been reports of attacks.
Everyone, prepare for the worst-case scenario and
act accordingly. The White Dragon says, "The
Arisen is a blade unsheathed, it will perish if
not honed." Now is the time to sharpen that power.

column3: 失われた秩序《最終報酬》

レスタニアで謎の敵が目撃されている
覚者は異質な魔物に対して
十分な警戒と備えを持って対処せよ
column4:
In Lestania, an unknown enemy has been sighted.
The Arisen should be prepared and vigilant in
dealing with these unfamiliar creatures.

column3:
事態は一定の収束をみた、迎撃態勢は解除する
覚者の協力については報酬を用意している
集計結果を待ってほしい
column4:
The situation has reached a certain resolution,
and the interception preparations will be lifted.
We have prepared rewards for the assistance of the
Arisen. Please wait for the aggregation results.

column3: 失われた秩序《最終報酬》

覚者への報酬が確定した
白竜の盾としての充分な活躍に感謝する
有事の際はまた協力を請う
column4:
The reward for the Arisen has been determined.
We are grateful for your sufficient contribution
as the Shield of the White Dragon.
In times of need, we will once again ask for your
cooperation.

column3:
レスタニアで謎の敵影が目撃され
襲撃報告も入ってきている
各自、最悪の状況を想定して行動せよ
白竜は言う「覚者とは抜き身の刃、研がねば腐る」
いまこそその力、研ぎ澄ますのだ
column4:
A mysterious enemy presence has been spotted in
Lestania, and there have been reports of attacks.
Everyone, prepare for the worst-case scenario and
act accordingly. The White Dragon says, "The
Arisen is a blade unsheathed, it will perish if
not honed." Now is the time to sharpen that power.

column3: 失われた秩序《リザルト報酬》

レスタニアで謎の敵が目撃されている
覚者は異質な魔物に対して
十分な警戒と備えを持って対処せよ
column4:
In Lestania, an unknown enemy has been sighted.
The Arisen should be prepared and vigilant in
dealing with these unfamiliar creatures.

column3: 迅速に討伐し、50000pt以上獲得を目指せ
column4:
Swiftly defeat the enemy and aim to acquire more
than 50,000 points.

column3: 目覚めし闇の魔物（管理）

ボルド大坑道にて召喚士の名を持つワイトの軍勢が
魔物を呼び寄せている
白衛騎士団が部隊を投じて調査にあたっていたが
早期の対処が必須とゲルト団長が判断
覚者への協力要請が伝えられた
召喚士群を至急全滅させ、封印せし魔壁内部へ急げ
column4:
In the Volden Large Tunnels, an army of Wights
with the title of summoner is summoning enemies.
The White Knight Order has deployed a unit to
investigate the situation. Captain Gerd has deemed
early intervention essential, and a request for
assistance has been delivered to the Arisen. Hurry
and eliminate the group of summoners, and make
your way inside the sealed magical wall.

column3: 目覚めし闇の魔物《最終報酬》
column4: The Demon of Darkness Awakens (Final Reward)

column3:
ボルド大坑道にて召喚士の名を持つワイトの軍勢が
魔物を呼び寄せている
魔壁を打ち破り、封印された最奥の地へ急げ
column4:
In the Volden Large Tunnels, an army of Wights
bearing the title of Summoner is summoning
enemies. Break through the magic barrier and
hasten to the deepest sealed grounds.

column3:
カースドラゴンの完全復活は防がれた
各々の戦果については追って報告があるので
それまでは待機とする
column4:
The complete revival of the Cursed Dragon was
prevented.
We will provide further reports on each
individual battle achievement, so please remain on
standby until then.

column3:
ボルド大坑道にて召喚士の名を持つワイトの軍勢が
魔物を呼び寄せている
白衛騎士団が部隊を投じて調査にあたっていたが
早期の対処が必須とゲルト団長が判断
覚者への協力要請が伝えられた
召喚士群を至急全滅させ、封印せし魔壁内部へ急げ
column4:
In the Volden Large Tunnels, an army of Wights
with the title of summoner is summoning enemies.
The White Knight Order has deployed a unit to
investigate the situation. Captain Gerd has deemed
early intervention essential, and a request for
assistance has been delivered to the Arisen. Hurry
and eliminate the group of summoners, and make
your way inside the sealed magical wall.

column3: 目覚めし闇の魔物《リザルト報酬》
column4: The Demon of Darkness Awakens (Result Reward)

column3:
ボルド大坑道での召喚士ワイトとの戦闘は続いている
覚者一人一人の戦力の配分が勝利への鍵である
その場に合わせた対応が不可欠だ
column4:
The battle with the Summoner Wights in the Volden
Large Tunnels continues.
The power and skills of each Arisen is the key to
victory.
It is essential to adapt to the situation.

column3: 召喚士の軍勢を全滅させ、勢力拡大を阻止せよ（残り４箇所）
column4:
Defeat the summoner's forces and prevent their
expansion (4 left)

column3: 召喚士の軍勢を全滅させ、勢力拡大を阻止せよ（残り３箇所）
column4:
Defeat the summoner's army and prevent their
expansion (3 left)

column3: 召喚士の軍勢を全滅させ、勢力拡大を阻止せよ（残り２箇所）
column4:
Defeat the summoner's army and prevent their
expansion (2 left)

column3: 召喚士の軍勢を全滅させ、勢力拡大を阻止せよ（残り１箇所）
column4:
Defeat the summoner's army and prevent their
expansion (1 left)

column3: カースドラゴンを討伐せよ

アルタード・ズールの軍勢が、突如魔赤島への
襲撃をはじめた
ズールの生命はやはり不死身なのだろうか
幾度となく復活を遂げる魔物への対処法はあるのか
今回こそは、ヤツを完全に仕留めるべく
考え得る最良の準備と戦略を用いて対抗せよ
column4:
The Altered Zuhl's army suddenly began their raid
on Bloodbane Isle.
Is Zuhl truly immortal?
Is there a way to deal with the monsters that
have repeatedly come back to life?
This time, prepare and strategize with the best
possible plan to completely take it down.

column3: 魔赤島の狂宴《最終報酬》
column4: Bloodbane Isle's Feast of Madness (Final Reward)

column3:
今回もなんとかズールを退けることができた
現在、覚者一人一人の戦果を確認している
ヤツがまた復活したときは協力を頼みたい
column4:
We were able to defeat Zuhl somehow once again
this time.
Currently, we are confirming the achievements of
each Arisen.
When that guy resurrects again, I'd like to ask
for your cooperation.

column3:
アルタード・ズールの軍勢が、突如魔赤島への
襲撃をはじめた
ズールの生命はやはり不死身なのだろうか
幾度となく復活を遂げる魔物への対処法はあるのか
今回こそは、ヤツを完全に仕留めるべく
考え得る最良の準備と戦略を用いて対抗せよ
column4:
The Altered Zuhl's army suddenly began their raid
on Bloodbane Isle.
Is Zuhl truly immortal?
Is there a way to deal with the monsters that
have repeatedly come back to life?
This time, prepare and strategize with the best
possible plan to completely take it down.

column3: 魔赤島の狂宴《リザルト報酬》
column4: Bloodbane Isle's Feast of Madness (Result Reward)

column3:
アルタード・ズールとの戦いは続いている
入念な準備と効果的な戦略を用意して
対抗せよ
column4:
The battle against the Altered Zuhl continues.
Prepare thoroughly and devise effective
strategies.
Take on the challenge.

column3: 魔物集団を討伐し、アルタード・ズールの元へ急げ
column4:
Defeat the group of enemies and hasten to Altered
Zuhl.

column3: アルタード・ズールを討伐し、魔赤島侵略を阻止せよ
column4:
Defeat Altered Zuhl and prevent the invasion of
Bloodbane Isle.
The Deathly Battle of the Ancient Temple
The Deathly Battle of the Ancient Temple

column3:
シェドレアン大神殿全域に侵食魔が出現した
アデルドナハと共する戦士が、急ぎ対応に向かったが
おびただしい数の侵食魔を前に救援要請が届いている
シェドレアン大神殿へ進攻し、侵食魔の拡がりを
最小限に食い止めよ
column4:
The infected demons have appeared in the entire
area of the Shadolean Great Temple. The soldiers
who accompany Adair Donnchadh hurriedly headed to
respond, but a request for reinforcement has been
received in front of an enormous number of
infected demons. Proceed to the Shadolean Great
Temple and stop the spread of the infection as
much as possible.

column3: 古代神殿の死闘《最終報酬》
column4:
The Deathly Battle of the Ancient Temple (Final
Reward)
The Deathly Battle of the Ancient Temple

column3:
古代神殿に巣食った侵食魔は一掃された
レスタニアの覚者への戦果は後程、通達される
それまでは待機とする
column4:
The corruption that had nested itself in the
ancient temple has been completely eradicated. The
achievements of the Arisen in Lestania will be
conveyed at a later time. Until then, please
remain on standby.

column3: 古代神殿の死闘　戦況：軽度
column4: The Deathly Battle of the Ancient Temple: Minor

column3:
古代神殿全域が侵食魔に制圧されてしまった
未だ侵食魔の数は計り知れないが油断はできない
討伐隊メンバーを２手に分け、迅速に神殿内全ての
箇所を確認し、魔物を見つけ次第殲滅せよ
魔物の状態を見極め、神殿内にある仕掛けを利用し
２手に分かれたメンバーをサポートすることも重要だ
column4:
The entire ancient temple has been completely
taken over by the Corruption.
The number of infected creatures is immeasurable,
and we cannot afford to let our guard down.
Divide the members of the extermination squad
into two groups and swiftly search every part of
the temple.
Eliminate the monsters as soon as you find them.
It is also important to assess the condition of
the creatures and make use of the mechanisms
within the temple to support the two divided
teams.

column3: 古代神殿の死闘《リザルト報酬》
column4:
The Deathly Battle of the Ancient Temple (Result
Reward)

column3:
古代神殿にて、侵食魔との戦いは続いている
侵食が極度に進行している魔物の存在も
確認されているようだ
対侵食魔用の戦闘準備は必須である
column4:
In the Ancient Temple, the battle against the
Corruption continues.
The existence of corrupt monsters that have
progressed to more advanced stages of infection
has been confirmed.
Preparing for combat against corrupted enemies is
mandatory.

column3: 最奥へ続く道の敵を殲滅
column4: Defeat the enemy on the way to the innermost

column3: 二手に分かれ、神殿内を捜索する
column4: Split into two groups and search inside the temple

column3: 《殲滅区 右方》序盤を進行中
column4:
[Extermination Area: Right Side] Opening stage in
progress

column3: 《殲滅区 左方》序盤を進行中
column4:
[Extermination Area: Left Side] Opening stage in
progress

column3: 魔物を呼ぶ元凶を討伐し、更なる増援を抑える
column4:
Defeat the monster caller, suppress further
reinforcements

column3: 《殲滅区 右方》中盤を進行中
column4:
[Extermination Area: Right Side] Middle stage in
progress

column3: 《殲滅区 左方》中盤を進行中
column4:
[Extermination Area: Left Side] Middle stage in
progress

column3: 《殲滅区 右方》終盤を進行中
column4:
[Extermination Area: Right Side] Final stage in
progress

column3: 《殲滅区 左方》終盤を進行中
column4:
[Extermination Area: Left Side] Final stage in
progress

column3: 《宝物庫》へ転移し、報酬を獲得
神殿内に残る最後の脅威を排除する
column4: Eliminate the last threat within the temple

column3: 古代神殿の死闘　戦況：重度
column4: The Deathly Battle of the Ancient Temple: Severe

column3:
古代神殿全域が侵食魔に制圧されてしまった
多数の侵食魔により、力量のある覚者も苦戦している
討伐隊メンバーを２手に分け、迅速に神殿内全ての
箇所を確認し、魔物を見つけ次第殲滅せよ
魔物の状態を見極め、神殿内にある仕掛けを利用し
２手に分かれたメンバーをサポートすることも重要だ
column4:
The entire ancient temple has been completely
taken over by the corruption.
Even the seasoned Arisen are struggling to
contend with the numerous Infected.
Divide the members of the extermination team into
two groups and quickly confirm every area inside
the temple.
Eliminate the enemies as soon as you find them.
It is also important to assess the condition of
the enemies and make use of the mechanisms within
the temple to support the two divided teams.

column3: 古代神殿の死闘《リザルト報酬》
column4:
The Deathly Battle of the Ancient Temple (Result
Reward)

column3:
古代神殿にて、侵食魔との戦いは続いている
侵食が極度に進行している魔物の存在も
確認されているようだ
対侵食魔用の戦闘準備は必須である
column4:
In the Ancient Temple, the battle against the
Corruption continues.
The existence of corrupt monsters that have
progressed to more advanced stages of infection
has been confirmed.
Preparing for combat against corrupted enemies is
mandatory.

column3: 古代神殿の死闘　戦況：危険
column4: The Deathly Battle of the Ancient Temple: Peril

column3:
古代神殿全域が侵食魔に制圧されてしまった
数多の侵食魔に、歴戦の猛者も太刀打ちできずにいる
討伐隊メンバーを２手に分け、迅速に神殿内全ての
箇所を確認し、魔物を見つけ次第殲滅せよ
魔物の状態を見極め、神殿内にある仕掛けを利用し
２手に分かれたメンバーをサポートすることも重要だ
column4:
Ancient Temple has been completely taken over by
the Corrupted.
Even the veterans of many battles cannot stand
against the countless number of infected monsters.
Divide the extermination team into two groups and
swiftly check every nook and cranny inside the
temple.
Slay every monster you come across immediately,
and use the traps and other mechanisms within the
temple to support members of both teams.

column3:
フィンダムの未来を賭けた精霊竜との戦いは
芯なる樹の樹内で起きた出来事のひとつとして
この聖なる不思議な場所に記憶された
再びその戦いの中に身を投じ、覚者として
壮絶な試練を乗り越えよ
column4:
The battle with the Spirit Dragon, which
determined the future of Phindym, is one of the
events that took place within the Core Tree.
This holy and mysterious place holds the memory
of that battle.
Once again, immerse yourself in that battle as an
Arisen.
Overcome the fierce trials that await you.

column3: 呼び覚まされし竜《最終報酬》

一部の覚者に向けた芯なる樹が記憶する
戦いへの挑戦は、一先ず終わったようだ
試練を経た覚者へ、モードレットより
後程報酬が送られる
column4:
To the Arisen who have successfully overcome the
challenge, a reward will be sent from Mordred
later.
The Core Tree, which holds the memories, is
dedicated to a select few Arisen.
It seems that the battle has come to a temporary
end.

column3:
フィンダムの未来を賭けた精霊竜との戦いは
芯なる樹の樹内で起きた出来事のひとつとして
この聖なる不思議な場所に記憶された
その記憶を求める一部の覚者にとって
それは過去を越える壮絶な試練となって
相対することになるだろう
column4:
The battle with the Spirit Dragon for future of
Phindym, was one of the events that took place
inside Core Tree. The memory of this event was
stored in this holy and mysterious place. For some
Arisen who seek this memory, it will become a
tremendous trial that surpasses the past, as they
come face to face with it.

column3: 呼び覚まされし竜《リザルト報酬》

ダナ・セントラムのリアガンより
芯なる樹が記憶する戦いについて
詳細を調べよ
column4:
From Riagan of Dana Centrum, confirm what the
core tree remembers of the battle.

column3: 呼び覚まされし精霊竜を討伐する

ダクレイム砦を悪しき竜軍が征服したようだ
場内はオークや大型の魔物で各エリアが占領され
大砲の弾が容赦なく降り注ぐ戦闘地帯となっている
まずは砦内へ進攻する手段を企て、戦況を好転させよ
悪しき竜軍側の反撃を抑え戦力を削り、砦最奥に潜む
獣の将を討伐して砦を奪還するのだ
column4:
It seems that the evil Dragon Army has conquered
the Dacreim Fortress. The area is occupied by orcs
and large monsters, turning it into a battlefield
where cannonballs rain mercilessly. First, we need
to devise a plan to infiltrate the fortress and
turn the tide of the battle. Suppress the evil
Dragon Army's counterattack and weaken their
forces, then defeat the Beast Master lurking in
the depths of the fortress to reclaim it.

column3:
ダクレイム砦でのウォーミッションは終了した
各々の戦果については追って報告があるので
それまでは待機とする
column4:
War missions at Dacreim Fortress have ended. We
will provide reports on the achievements of each
individual battle shortly. Until then, please
remain on standby.

column3:
ティネス砦にいるアシュトンより、各個人の戦果に
伴う報酬を受け取ることが出来る
特別な報酬には受け取るための条件や上限数が
あるため、貢献具合に応じた品物を選ぶように
column4:
From Fort Thines, Ashton informs that it is
possible to receive rewards corresponding to
individual achievements. There are conditions and
limits to receiving special rewards, so choose
items based on your level of contribution.

column3: ダクレイム砦奪還戦　戦況：敵軍殲滅
column4:
Dacreim Fortress Recapture Battle: Enemy
Annihilation

column3:
ダクレイム砦を悪しき竜軍が征服したようだ
場内はオークや大型の魔物で各エリアが占領され
大砲の弾が容赦なく降り注ぐ戦闘地帯となっている
まずは砦内へ進攻する手段を企て、戦況を好転させよ
悪しき竜軍側の反撃を抑え戦力を削り、砦最奥に潜む

column4:
It seems that the evil Dragon Army has conquered
the Dacreim Fortress. The area is occupied by orcs
and large monsters, turning it into a battlefield
where cannonballs rain mercilessly. First, we need
to devise a plan to infiltrate the fortress and
turn the tide of the battle. Suppress the evil
Dragon Army's counterattack and weaken their
forces, then defeat the Beast Master lurking in
the depths of the fortress to reclaim it.

column3: よろしくお願いします
今日は楽しかったです
どうすればいいですか？
今どんな武器を持っていますか？
フレンドになってくれませんか？
クランに入りませんか？
クランに入れてくれませんか？
グループチャットに入りませんか？
グループチャットに入れてくれませんか？
どのジョブを持っていますか？
他にどのジョブができますか？
準備はできていますか？
後でまたお話ししてください
今は個人行動を優先中です
答えたいですが、表現がわかりません
column4: I hear you, but I don't know how to answer

column3: せっかくですが遠慮します
もうすぐ別の予定があります

column4: I'm in the middle of a fight

column3: すでに誘われています
マーカーを目指しましょう
アイテムを補充します
アイテムがいっぱいになりました
もう一度行きませんか？
こちらは短期間でもOKです
レベル差が少ないほうがいいですね
column4: It's better to be within a few levels

column3: リーダーを変更します
ポーンを参加させます
少し下がってください
敵に注視されぬよう気をつけてください
これを先にやっつけて！
攻撃しないでください
支援行動をお願いします！
現地に集合しましょう
状態異常に気を付けましょう！
